io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.offermanagement.logic.api.usecase

Interface UcManageProduct

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Offermanagement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OffermanagementImpl, UcManageProductImpl

    public interface UcManageProduct
    Interface of UcManageProduct to centralize documentation and signatures of methods.
    Author:
    mvielsac

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteProduct(Long productId)
      Deletes a ProductEto.
      void deleteProductPicture(Long productId)
      Deletes the Picture of the ProductEto.
      ProductEto saveProduct(ProductEto product)
      If no ID is contained creates the ProductEto for the first time.
      void updateProductPicture(Long productId, Blob blob, BinaryObjectEto binaryObjectEto)
      Updates the picture of the product.

    • Method Detail

      • saveProduct

        ProductEto saveProduct(ProductEto product)
        If no ID is contained creates the ProductEto for the first time. Else it updates the ProductEto with given ID. If no ProductEto with given ID is present, an exception will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        product - the ProductEto to persist.
        Returns:
        the persisted ProductEto.

      • deleteProduct

        void deleteProduct(Long productId)
        Deletes a ProductEto.
        Parameters:
        productId - is the ID of the ProductEto to delete

      • updateProductPicture

        void updateProductPicture(Long productId,
                        Blob blob,
                        BinaryObjectEto binaryObjectEto)
        Updates the picture of the product.
        Parameters:
        productId - is the ID of the ProductEto to update the picture
        blob - is the binary representation of the picture
        binaryObjectEto - is the mimeType of the blob

      • deleteProductPicture

        void deleteProductPicture(Long productId)
        Deletes the Picture of the ProductEto.
        Parameters:
        productId - is the ID of the ProductEto to delte the picture
